messages.subject: Re:Interesting Seasonal Ritual--sponsored trees
messages.msgSnippet: ... won t mention any names, but someone I know qualified to receive gifts of this sort.  Meanwhile, her kids also received tons of gifts from their Dad (who
messages.messageBody:
>>>One of them will have sponsored trees somewhere in your community.>>>

won't mention any names, but someone I know qualified to receive gifts
of this sort. Meanwhile, her kids also received tons of gifts from their
Dad (who doesn't live with them). They got so much it was disgusting. I
suppose there will always be abuse. Hopefully most of the needy really
are.
Mary Ellen
Snowflakes are on of nature's most fragile things,
but just look at what they can do
when they stick together.
